main event: A very bright, triangular-shaped light was seen hovering over the Greenfield Reservoir near Springfield, Ohio in 1962.
interesting points: The light was approximately 40 feet long and hovered for a few minutes before departing rapidly overhead.
The observers were unable to hear any sound associated with the object.
The witness was a qualified observer of military and commercial aircraft, having worked as an inspector at a commercial airport for 20 years.
The witness had frequently noticed curious activity of unidentified craft in the area and felt they were worthy of scientific investigation.
There were multiple sightings of similar objects reported in the area.
witnesses: A driver and passenger in a parked car
